scripts.release: turbo run build test lint && changeset publish
scripts.predeploy: git pull -r && turbo run build test lint
scripts.deploy: changeset version && git commit -am 'Bump versions for release' && changeset publish
scripts.prepare-beta: changeset pre enter beta && git add .changeset/pre.json && git commit -am 'Prepare for beta release'
scripts.exit-beta: changeset pre exit && git commit -am 'Exit beta release'
